title: Introduction to Python Programming
course_details: Learn the syntax, data types, and control structures of the Python programming language.

title: Web Development with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
course_details: Build innovative websites and web applications with JavaScript, CSS, and HTML.

title: Java Programming for Beginners
course_details: Learn the fundamentals of Java programming, object-oriented theory, and application development.

title: Data Science with Python
course_details: Learn how to use Python for data analysis, visualization, and machine learning.

title: React.js Fundamentals
course_details: Learn the fundamentals of using React.js to create user interfaces.

title: Node.js and Express.js for Backend Development
course_details: Build server-side apps with Node.js and Express.js, according to the course details.

title: Python for Data Science and Machine Learning
course_details: Explore Python's machine learning and data science libraries in depth.

title: Database (MySQL)
course_details: This course will provide you the skills you need to construct, manage, and query databases using MySQL, whether you're a developer, data analyst, or aspiring database administrator.

title: Problem-Solving Part
course_details: It is a long established fact that a reader  will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout.
